TextLibrary.Text: LYDIA
Hey, kid, we're receiving a message from Trident Command.
Hey, kid, we're receiving a message from Trident Command.
Trident? What a coincidence. Put them through.
Trident? What a coincidence. Put them through.
Greetings. My name is General Tarn. I represent the Trident Megacorp.
Greetings. My name is General Tarn. I represent the Trident Megacorp.
Greetings, General. To what do we owe this pleasure.
Greetings, General. To what do we owe this pleasure.
No pleasure. Strictly business. Military business.
No pleasure. Strictly business. Military business.
I'm listening.
I'm listening.
Trident is aware that you are in possession of a strategic asset.
Trident is aware that you are in possession of a strategic asset.
You mean, Beta Prime?
You mean, Beta Prime?
Fool! This is an unsecure channel! You'll have ships on your tail now that you've mentioned his name.
Fool! This is an unsecure channel! You'll have ships on your tail now that you've mentioned his name.
Her name, General. Beta Prime is a female.
Her name, General. Beta Prime is a female.
Immaterial! Meet with me on neutral ground in the Vortraag System. We will discuss a deal: our protection in exchange for interaction with this asset.
Immaterial! Meet with me on neutral ground in the Vortraag System. We will discuss a deal: our protection in exchange for interaction with this asset.
We'll be there, General.
We'll be there, General.
